title.narrative: IR 1.2 POLIO 2012

description.narrative: IR 1.2 POLIO 2012: Children of <5 year specially from marginalized & high risk populations benefit from high quality communication interventions for polio eradication., which contributes to Immunization. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 1 Children and women, particularly vulnerable and marginalized groups, benefit from integrated basic health services of high quality by end 2012

participating-org.narrative: NATIONAL PROGRAMME FOR FP AND PHC

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: IR 1.2 POLIO 2012: Children of <5 year specially from marginalized & high risk populations benefit from high quality communicationinterventions for polio eradication.
